import React from 'react' import {Modal, Button, Form} from 'react-bootstrap' import { numberWithCommas } from '../utils/utils' const ModalKeranjang = ({ showModal, handleClose, keranjangDetail, jumlah, harga_satuan, tambah, kurang, }) => { if(keranjangDetail){ return (

{keranjangDetail.product.nama_barang}

{/*

*/} Rp. {numberWithCommas(keranjangDetail.product.harga)}

Total Harga :

Rp. {numberWithCommas(keranjangDetail.total_harga)}

{jumlah}
) }else{ return ( Kosong Kosong ) } } export default ModalKeranjang
